output: A strong, powerfully built horse with muscles rippling beneath its chestnut coat stands poised, head held high, as a confident rider sits firmly atop its back. The sun shines brightly at midday, illuminating their figures against a backdrop of an expansive, rolling ranchland dotted with swaying fields of grass. Bathed in natural light, the image should capture a feeling of freedom and deep connection between horse and rider as they gaze out across the open landscape.
